栻字的基本解释

栻
shì
古代占卜时日的用具，后来叫星盘：“天文郎按栻于前，日时加某，莽旋席随斗柄而坐。”
古书上说的一种树。

栻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》恥力切，入職，徹。］
［《集韻》設職切，入職，書。］
古代占卜时日的器具，后称为星盘。

栻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栻； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页524第10
【唐韻】恥力切【集韻】蓄力切，?音敕。【廣韻】木名。　又【博雅】梮也，梮有天地，所以推隂陽，占吉凶，以楓子棗心木爲之。【前漢·王莽傳】天文郞按栻于前。【周禮·春官·抱天時註】作式。【前漢·藝文志】有羨門式法。　又【集韻】設職切，音式。義同。

栻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栻字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，也可指占卜时日的工具，亦称星盘。

栻
Basic explanation of words
栻
shì
The tool used for divination in ancient times was later called the astrolabe: "Tenman Lang press the front, add a certain day at the time, and sit on the spine with the handle."
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
栻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" is shameful, entertaining, and thorough. ]
["Jiyun" set up job cut, entry, book. ]
The tools used for divination in ancient times are later called astrolabes.
栻

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栻; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 524 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Shame to cut [Ji Yun] to accumulate energy to cut,? Yin Chi. [Guangyun] Wooden name.　[Bo Ya] Chan Ye, Chan has heaven and earth, so I push yin and yang to account for good and bad, and use maple and jujube tree for it. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Astronomy Yan presses on the front. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Baotian Shi Note】style. [Previous Han·Art and Wenzhi] There is the envy style method.　[Jiyun] Set up job cut, sound style. The same meaning.
